title: Stockholm font
content:
Hi there,

Newbie to the forum. I'm looking for a free font that looks like Stockholm.  
Any suggestions will be greatly appreciated.

Dgman
author: dgman

comments.content: Stockholm the city? Or a font named Stockholm? Can you provide a link?
I've never come across anything free that is similar to your request. Good luck.

Thanks guys. Yes, you're right mili. I will keep trying.

Later,

Dgman
